text: Answer: (a, b, c, d) Solution: (a) it should be privileged instruction (b) it should be privileged instruction, as it required to access TLB which is hardware in OS. (c) This would wipe out the code and data of the OS and any other processes. User level processes should not be allowed to do this. Should be privileged. (d) By changing the base and limit registers, a user level process would be able to access all data and instructions belonging to the OS or any other processes. Should be privileged.
